long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Upwork Job Earnings Calculator & Evaluator

Optimize your Upwork job search with the Upwork Job Earnings Calculator & Evaluator extension. This essential tool for freelancers and agencies helps you estimate your net earnings after Upwork fees and VAT, ensuring you have a clear understanding of your potential income. Our advanced job evaluator also provides a detailed score for each job based on key factors such as payment verification, client spending history, reviews, and experience level. Make informed decisions and increase your chances of securing high-quality projects on Upwork.

Features:

Accurate Earnings Calculation: Instantly estimate your net earnings after deducting Upwork fees and VAT. See your potential income in both USD and EUR.
Comprehensive Job Evaluation: Get a job score out of 10 based on important criteria including payment verification, client spending history, positive reviews, and required experience level.
Detailed Insights: Receive a breakdown of why each job received its score, helping you prioritize the best opportunities.
Real-time Updates: The extension dynamically processes new job listings as they appear, ensuring you always have up-to-date information.
User Preferences: Save your VAT preferences for consistent calculations across all job listings.

Why Install This Extension?

Maximise Your Earnings: Understand exactly how much you'll earn from each project after fees and taxes.
Choose the Best Jobs: Quickly identify high-quality job postings that meet your criteria, saving time and effort in your job search.
Increase Your Success Rate: Focus on jobs with verified payment, high spending clients, and positive reviews to increase your chances of getting hired.
Easy to Use: Simple interface and seamless integration with Upworkâ€™s job search page.

Ideal For:

Freelancers: Optimize your job search and increase your earnings by focusing on the best job opportunities.
New Upwork Users: Gain a competitive edge by understanding the financial aspects of job postings and making informed decisions.

Enhance your Upwork job search experience with the Upwork Job Earnings Calculator & Evaluator. 

Install now and take control of your freelance career!
